name: Magnecyte
description:
MAGNECYTE -- A tiny top-down survival game about an electromagnetic alien fish.
Built by three people in ten days as a private "game jam" challenge.


Controls

Movement: Arrow Keys
Action: Z and X
Dash: Shift or Space

Objective

You are a MAGNECYTE, a tiny fish with electromagnetic powers,
trying to survive on the deadly sea floor of an alien planet. 
Score as much points as you can before the hungry MUNCHERS get you!

Credits

Programming: Emil Åberg
Graphics: Gillis Gröndahl
Audio: David Sundqvist
Game by: Chen Space Program
